summary:
This is really small, frendly and fully compatible mod (Compatible with DLC's and mods), which make that NPC have a little more arrows than in vanilla Skyrim.
And ini tweak, who make that NPC's dont have infinite arrows.
descriptionHtml:
Hi everyone!
First of all sorry for my English and mistakes, which i will commit. If you fond some let me know and i will improve it ;)
I was always desgusted when in fight NPC use bows, but them ammo has never ends. 
You probably know this event:


Story
DDovahkiin: "I have super deadric arrow. And i going to kill these Bandits in the tower." 
(You're sneaking, then aiming to bandit, and at least you shooting)
Bandit Boss: (He get some demage, but not much) "You are dead right now." 
(he stay on the top of tower, equip long bow and Your's deadric arrow and he start shooting to you when you kill another bandits by your's BIG AXE or something else)
Suddenly your health drops to half, you go heal by potions or spells, you see that you have a dedric arrow on your knee but you go back to fight. Then you get the second arrow, this time on the second knee. 
D: "Hey this is my deadric arrow too, WTF man i shoot you only once"
B: "hahahahaha You,re like my cousin's cat...." - or some else nerdy text
That was the last what you say, because on this moment you get a special gift - third deadric arrow and you fall down form the walls. 
All skyrim crying because of your's dead.
Aludiun, Wampires, Ancano, and more Rule/destroy the world, people is skyrim kill chickens! 
because bandit can multiply arrows on the middle of fight.


Ini Tweak
What it is?

A super pro top secret informations, about your skyrim. Only God and informatiks can understand it.
As we know informatiks aren't helpful on that kind of situations but God sometimes send a messages to immortal people.
One of them contains: 
[Combat]
bForceNPCsUseAmmo=1

What it mean?


b - it is probably a letter, no it is DEFINITELY a letter!
Force - it is about StarWars and midichlorians, you need a Force to do something in skyrim.
Force is everywere, so if you are a jedi knight you will have easier.
NPCs - "Non Player Characters" Dont ask it is too hard, even God don't know.
Use - It is probably about using force
Ammo - I have no idea what it is... There isn't any guns in Skyrim so who need ammo?


What it do?
This is a simple setting on Skyrim.
It make that every NPC have limited arrows and he can use it all.
So when dragon atack the city, guards will shoot to him, but after a few minutes they will be only runing around the city and don't know what to do, because dragon is flying and them dont have arrows to shoot him.
For me it is really immersive and add a lot of fun to game.


How to use it?
It is no so hard...

First of all be patient, possessed and clear your mind.

There is two ways:
First: download this mod and install it (the archive contain two magic files: *.esp and *.ini)
Secound: open "My documents" next go to "my games" catalog, then "skyrim" catalog and at least open "skyrim.ini" by notebook and under the [Combat] title paste it:


bForceNPCsUseAmmo=1


If you dont have [Combat] title, simple create it.

The full road to this file:

(Disc,where you have installed skyrim):/Documends and settings/(name of your account)/My documents/my games/skyrim/skyrim.ini
On 90% it is:

C;/Documends and settings/User/Mydocumenys/mygames/skyrimskyrim.ini

For disable change 1 to 0.
It is all


Difficulties

This tweak have a small trap:

Some NPC have only a few arrows so they beame totally unless.
For example: Dwemer Ballista have only one arrow... bolt... whatever, and after single shot this top technology machine cant do nothing. It will stay or run away.

So i created his is really small, frendly and fully compatible mod (Compatible with DLC's and mods), which make that NPC have a little more arrows than in vanilla Skyrim.

Example:
City guards have 50 arrows. 
Dewmer Balistas have 10 bolts
Bandits have 30 arrows.
Special archers NPC have 100 arrows
inc.

(I'm open for sugestions)

Now you can use your head in fight vs archer.
"Rush hard"
You can run with big sword or something else, to him and try kill him.
"Camp"
Or you can hide using shield or terrain and wait for out of arrows your enemy.
"Archer fight"
He shoot you, you shoot him and will see which will die first.
Yours companions also have limited arrows so you must sometimes give it them if you want they use bows/crossbows.
